articles.author: Kellen Forrest
articles.title: Ex-governor, UN ambassador calls out Eileen Gu: 'You're either American or Chinese' - Yahoo Canada Sports
articles.description: Eileen Gu continues to take heat for her decision to represent China at the Olympics.
articles.content: The Beijing Games have been a thrill for three-time medalist Eileen Gu, but the American-born skier has faced some harsh criticism for her decision to represent China on the Olympic stage. Among Gu's… [+2368 chars]
